json.title: Senior Developer (Laravel | NestJs | Next.js | Devops)
json.descriptionHtml:
Senior Full-Stack Developer (Laravel | NestJS | Next.js | GraphQL | PostgreSQL)

‚ö†Ô∏è Please do not apply if you do not meet the qualifications listed below.


We are looking for an experienced Full-Stack Developer who is highly skilled in Laravel, NestJS, Next.js, GraphQL, and PostgreSQL. This is a full-time role for a candidate who can design, develop, and optimize scalable, SEO-friendly, and high-performance applications from the backend to the frontend.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain backend applications using Laravel and NestJS.
  • Build frontend interfaces and server-side rendering applications using Next.js.
  • Design, optimize, and maintain PostgreSQL relational databases with a focus on performance and scalability.
  • Implement and manage GraphQL APIs for efficient client-server communication.
  • Ensure SEO-friendly architecture and technical SEO optimizations (page speed, structured data, indexing, Core Web Vitals).
  • Optimize queries and application performance using Eloquent ORM and other tools.
  • Manage Redis cache strategies and implement performance enhancements.
  • Handle Dockerized development and production environments, including multi-stage builds and image optimization.
  • Manage CI/CD pipelines, deployments, environment, and secret management.
  • Actively participate in technical and architectural decision-making.
  • Perform production-level maintenance, refactoring, and updates without causing system downtime.


Requirements:

  • Minimum 5 years of Laravel experience.
  • Strong experience with NestJS, Next.js, and GraphQL.
  • Advanced SQL and relational database design skills, specifically with PostgreSQL.
  • Strong technical SEO knowledge and experience implementing SEO best practices.
  • Experience with Eloquent ORM performance optimization.
  • Solid DevOps skills, including CI/CD, deployment, and Linux server management.
  • Experience with Docker, multi-stage builds, and containerized environments.
  • Knowledge of Redis and caching strategies.
  • Strong understanding of code quality, security, and performance optimization.


Preferred (Not Required):

  • Experience with Kubernetes or container orchestration.
  • Experience with queues, jobs, and microservices architectures.


Work Conditions:

  • Full-time position, 6 days per week.
  • The salary will be starting from 1400$/month
  • Remote work via Zoom live screen sharing.
  • Immediate availability preferred.
  • Candidates will be given a technical task to evaluate skills. AI-assisted task submissions will be rejected.

json.title: Full Stack Engineer, LearnWith.AI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
json.descriptionHtml:
We're seeking a Full-Stack Engineer who excels at tackling intricate technical problems and shipping features that matter. In this role, you'll contribute to cutting-edge AI-driven products that reshape how individuals learn and develop. Your work will center on delivering excellence‚Äîbuilding systems that scale, remain maintainable, and create meaningful impact.

Our Products Are Redefining The Learning Landscape

  • TeachTap: Uses AI to animate historical figures within a TikTok-style educational platform.
  • TeachTales: Captivates learners through personalized, enchanting narratives that enhance understanding.
  • TimeBack: Functions as an intelligent learning assistant, embedding into current applications to provide proactive student coaching.
  • Athena: Employs AI-generated video content and assessments to produce quantifiable educational results.

This position is designed to create tangible impact through functional software. You'll leverage AI-assisted development tools and cloud-native infrastructure to construct full-stack solutions addressing substantive challenges‚Äînot simply completing task lists. Expect to deploy rapidly while maintaining quality, selecting the most straightforward appropriate approach that reconciles immediate velocity with sustained maintainability.

If you're prepared to navigate sophisticated technical obstacles and deliver features with measurable impact, we want to connect with you.

What You Will Be Doing

  • Develop and Deploy Complete Features: Guide user stories from concept through production impact; refine specifications, architect scalable implementations, implement both server-side and client-side logic, validate thoroughly, and release to live environments
  • Identify and Resolve Defects: Diagnose problems using root cause methodology, address underlying issues (rather than surface symptoms), and prevent future regressions through strategic testing
  • Elevate Engineering Standards: Assess technical plans and code submissions to verify clarity, simplicity, and correctness, preventing technical debt accumulation from the outset

What You Won‚Äôt Be Doing

  • Creating pixel-perfect interfaces or intricate backend systems as ends in themselves
  • Executing specifications mechanically without grasping the underlying challenge
  • Spending excessive time in meetings debating roadmaps and priorities or tracking down stakeholders
  • Simply delivering features; your accountability extends to solving genuine user problems

Full Stack Engineer Key Responsibilities

  • Applying AI to create software that addresses authentic user needs, deploys quickly, and remains sustainable over time

Basic Requirements

  • A minimum of 4 years writing production-grade code for both frontend and backend components of web applications (framework-agnostic).
  • Proven ownership: Track record of owning entire modules, product capabilities, or teams‚Äîbeyond isolated task execution
  • Self-directed execution: Capacity to remove your own blockers, establish your own rhythm, and navigate forward through uncertain conditions
  • Practical experience incorporating generative A.I. into your regular development workflow

About LearnWith.AI

LearnWith.AI is an edtech startup that leverages AI and subject matter experts to cultivate a new way of learning. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and AI-powered coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn more, learn faster, and learn better - and have fun while doing it. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with us

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover as a Contractor of Record. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

json.companyDescription:
Crossover is a global recruitment company, founded in 2014. We're the world's largest recruiter that specializes in elite full-time remote jobs, hiring the top 1% of tech talent from every corner of the planet.

We find awesome talent in overlooked places, by posting jobs all over the world, and giving everyone an equal opportunity to prove their skills are world-class. Our system of AI-powered assessments is based on objective factors that are scientifically proven to predict high performance (e.g. cognitive aptitude).

ùëµùíêùíïùíÜ: Crossover jobs are are fully compliant with LinkedIn's policies, as well as the applicable laws in every country where we advertise.

Allow us to clarify some common misconceptions:
1) The reason we post so many job ads is because LinkedIn organizes all job postings by location. So, the only way to reach candidates all over the world is to post multiple ads in every city you want to hire from. Most recruiters don't bother because it's too time consuming... but we're not most recruiters.
2) We mostly recruit independent contractors, not employees, because labor laws vary so much from one country to another that it's near-impossible to recruit globally otherwise (which is why it's still uncommon even though most jobs can now be done remotely).
3) As is standard for any self-employed person, the stated pay is the entire compensation package. Because they are not employees, each contractor is responsible for handling the things that an employer would take care of e.g. taxes, equipment, vacation time, health insurance. One of the major reasons that Crossover jobs pay so much more than local jobs is to overcompensate for these costs.

It's hard, but it's worth it!

json.title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer, IgniteTech (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
json.descriptionHtml:
The software development sector is undergoing rapid transformation, fueled by the need to accelerate development cycles, minimize human error, and improve code quality. These improvements are critical because they directly impact product time-to-market and customer satisfaction. Historically, software deployment timelines have been hindered by conventional coding methodologies, with approximately 30% of projects running over schedule due to inefficiencies and errors.

IgniteTech is spearheading this transformation by incorporating cutting-edge GenAI technologies to reshape software architecture and development practices. Rather than focusing on incremental progress, this position provides the exciting prospect of driving major AI-powered initiatives. You will operate at the vanguard of AI integration, not merely improving but fundamentally transforming software development workflows and results, delivering substantial gains in efficiency and strategic competitiveness.

This position is tailored for individuals committed to operating at the forefront of technological innovation. It is not simply an operational or task-execution role; it is a strategic position involving comprehensive research and development, prototyping, and the deployment of AI in building next-generation software products. The ideal candidate possesses not only technical proficiency in AI and software architecture but also a visionary mindset for applying technology to drive business innovation.

In this capacity, you will guide our team in establishing the architectural foundations and strategies that embed AI into our software offerings. This position is central to our objectives, and your contributions will have a direct bearing on the productivity and quality of our outputs. We encourage you to apply if you are committed to expanding the frontiers of technology and motivated to deliver measurable impact within the software industry.

What You Will Be Doing

  • Architect comprehensive frameworks for AI-powered systems that automate sophisticated elements of software development, including architecture generation, dependency management, and advanced predictive coding capabilities.
  • Engage deeply with emerging trends in AI and software engineering through R&D activities, conference participation, and collaboration with academic and professional networks. When new AI technologies emerge, we must be positioned among the earliest adopters.

What You Won‚Äôt Be Doing

  • Routine Code Maintenance: Regularly updating or debugging existing software code to address minor issues or enhance functionality.
  • Standard Software Development: Basic coding or software development activities that involve implementing straightforward features or functionalities without AI integration.

Artificial Intelligence Engineer Key Responsibilities

  • Apply your engineering capabilities to achieve substantial gains in development velocity, reduction in human error, and enhancement of code quality, ultimately accelerating time-to-market for software products and improving customer satisfaction.

Basic Requirements

  • A minimum of 3 years of experience as a full-stack software developer (you must possess both front-end and back-end coding expertise)
  • Extensive experience using GenAI code assistants (e.g., Github Copilot, Cursor.sh, v0.dev)
  • Prior experience successfully deploying Generative AI products/projects/solutions/tools
  • Prior experience utilizing different LLMs (e.g., GPT, Claude, Mistral) to address business challenges
  • A clear understanding of when and why to select specific LLM models for different tasks
  • Proven understanding and previous application of the Model Context Protocol (MCP)

About IgniteTech

World-class talent. 100% global remote.

Ready to be a part of the top talent that IgniteTech has curated from thousands of applicants throughout the world? Come join us.

Through our portfolio of leading enterprise software solutions, we ignite business performance for thousands of customers globally. We‚Äôre big believers in the remote-work-from-anywhere lifestyle, which creates freedom for our team members and enables us to hire the best and brightest from around the world. A career with IgniteTech is challenging and fast-paced and we‚Äôre always looking for energetic and enthusiastic team members.

We‚Äôre an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity employer and we value the strength that diversity brings to our workplace.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with us

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover as a Contractor of Record. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

Crossover Job Code: LJ-5269-PK-KarƒÅchi-ArtificialInte.011

json.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer, LearnWith.AI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
json.descriptionHtml:
This role is designed for exceptional engineers who value ownership, strategic impact, and solving demanding technical problems. You will be responsible for developing the product's most critical features while guiding its technical trajectory and maintaining its long-term resilience and expansion. The technical choices you make will have direct consequences for the product and its user base, providing you with freedom to experiment and accountability to execute.

The Products You'll Contribute To Are Reshaping Education

  • TeachTap: Uses AI to animate historical figures within a TikTok-style learning interface.
  • TeachTales: Captivates students through customized, immersive storytelling that enhances understanding.
  • TimeBack: Functions as a learning assistant that connects with existing applications, offering proactive student guidance.
  • Athena: Employs AI-created videos and assessments to produce concrete academic results.

Your work will steer the technical progression of our products, making certain they remain scalable, maintainable, and resilient over time. Working in close partnership with product teams, you will convert broad requirements into technical architecture decisions and address intricate challenges while upholding rigorous quality benchmarks. The choices you make will define the product's trajectory and affect how thousands of students engage with learning material.

We emphasize deliberate planning and early-stage design. Our AI-first methodology automates repetitive work, allowing you to concentrate on consequential decisions and complex problem-solving. You will enjoy significant autonomy and the capacity to shape product strategy while prioritizing enduring stability and scalability.

If you are prepared to guide the technical advancement of our SaaS products and apply generative AI to expand what's possible, we encourage you to apply.

What You Will Be Doing

  • Feature Development: Architecting and building new features with emphasis on scalability, maintainability, and sustained product value.
  • Requirement Engineering: Partnering with the product team to clarify requirements and guiding technical conversations to ensure features align with product objectives.
  • Operations and Maintenance: Overseeing and sustaining product reliability, optimizing performance, and proactively detecting and addressing issues.
  • Technical Design: Making high-stakes technical choices that directly influence user experience and product scalability.

What You Won‚Äôt Be Doing

  • Jumping between short-lived projects or pursuing the latest hype-driven technology fad.
  • Contributing to internal IT infrastructure or outsourced initiatives that lack tangible user impact.
  • Spending time in unproductive meetings or troubleshooting monotonous infrastructure problems.

Basic Requirements

Senior Full-Stack Engineer key responsibilities

  • At least 1 year of full-stack development experience, working on front and backend features.
  • At least 2 years as the primary technical contributor for a SaaS product, driving strategic technical decisions.
  • At least 4 years of experience working on actual SaaS products, not outsourcing or internal IT projects.
  • Experience in using generative AI in your day-to-day development work.

About LearnWith.AI

LearnWith.AI is an edtech startup that leverages AI and subject matter experts to cultivate a new way of learning. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and AI-powered coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn more, learn faster, and learn better - and have fun while doing it. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with us

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover as a Contractor of Record. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

json.companyDescription:
Crossover is a global recruitment company, founded in 2014. We're the world's largest recruiter that specializes in elite full-time remote jobs, hiring the top 1% of tech talent from every corner of the planet.

We find awesome talent in overlooked places, by posting jobs all over the world, and giving everyone an equal opportunity to prove their skills are world-class. ùëµùíêùíïùíÜ: Crossover jobs are are fully compliant with LinkedIn's policies, as well as the applicable laws in every country where we advertise.

Allow us to clarify some common misconceptions:
1) The reason we post so many job ads is because LinkedIn organizes all job postings by location. So, the only way to reach candidates all over the world is to post multiple ads in every city you want to hire from. Most recruiters don't bother because it's too time consuming... but we're not most recruiters.
2) We mostly recruit independent contractors, not employees, because labor laws vary so much from one country to another that it's near-impossible to recruit globally otherwise (which is why it's still uncommon even though most jobs can now be done remotely).
3) As is standard for any self-employed person, the stated pay is the entire compensation package. Because they are not employees, each contractor is responsible for handling the things that an employer would take care of e.g. taxes, equipment, vacation time, health insurance. One of the major reasons that Crossover jobs pay so much more than local jobs is to overcompensate for these costs.

It's hard, but it's worth it!

json.title: Full Stack Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
Job Title

Full-Stack Developer (Flutter + .NET)

Overview

We‚Äôre building a mobile-first product with a Flutter frontend and a .NET backend, heavily augmented by AI. We‚Äôre looking for a full-stack developer who can ship end-to-end features and fully leverage AI tools to move faster, design better systems, and reduce manual work.

This role expects you to treat AI as a daily productivity multiplier, not a novelty.

Responsibilities
  • Build and maintain Flutter mobile features (iOS & Android)
  • Design and implement .NET (ASP.NET Core) backend APIs
  • Work with PostgreSQL (or similar relational databases)
  • Integrate third-party APIs and internal services
  • Design clean data flows between mobile, backend, and AI services
  • Use AI tools to:
  • Accelerate feature development
  • Generate, refactor, and review code
  • Assist with system design and debugging
  • Collaborate on architecture decisions with a bias toward simplicity and scalability
  • Own features end-to-end, from idea to production
Required Skills
  • Strong production experience with Flutter (Dart)
  • Solid experience with C# / .NET (ASP.NET Core)
  • REST API design and implementation
  • Relational database experience (Postgres, SQL Server, etc.)
  • Git and modern CI/CD workflows
  • Ability to independently deliver complete features
AI-Specific Requirements (Important)

You must be comfortable and proactive with AI-assisted development, including:

  • Daily use of tools like Claude AI (or equivalent LLMs)
  • Experience or strong interest in multi-agent AI workflows (e.g. using agents for planning, coding, testing, refactoring, analysis)
  • Using AI to:
  • Break down complex tasks
  • Explore multiple implementation approaches
  • Improve code quality and speed of delivery
  • Understanding AI limitations and validating outputs (not blindly copy-pasting)

You don‚Äôt need to be an ‚ÄúAI researcher,‚Äù but you do need to think in terms of human + AI as a system.

  • Experience integrating LLMs into products or internal tooling
  • Familiarity with background jobs, queues, or async processing
  • Docker / containerized deployments
  • Cloud experience (AWS / Azure / GCP)
  • Experience working in small, fast-moving teams
What We Value
  • Builders who bias toward execution
  • Simple, scalable solutions over clever abstractions
  • High ownership and accountability
  • Clear thinking and clean code
  • Using AI to remove bottlenecks, not add complexity
Work Style
  • Small team
  • High autonomy
  • Minimal meetings
  • Focus on shipping real product, fast

json.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please do not apply if your salary expectations are higher than the provided Salary Range and experience less than 2.5-3 years. If you have experience with Travel Industry and worked on Hotel, Car Rental or Ferry Booking before then we can negotiate the package.


Company Description:

Our company is involved in promoting Greece for the last 25 years through travel sites visited from all around the world with 10 million visitors per year such www.greeka.com, www.ferriesingreece.com etc.

Through the websites, we provide a range of travel services for a seamless holiday experience such online car rental reservations, ferry tickets, transfers, tours etc.


Role Description:

This is a full-time remote role for a ReactJs / NextJS Front End Developers.

As a Frontend Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining the UI/UX changes of all applications using Latest Frontend Frameworks such as ReactJs, NextJS etc.

Your day-to-day tasks will include designing and implementing our own APIs into Frontend sites and collaborating with the backend development team to ensure seamless integration.


Qualifications:

‚Ä¢ Strong proficiency in React.JS, Next.JS, Redux, AngularJS frontend frameworks.

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

‚Ä¢ Understanding of version control systems, such as Git

‚Ä¢ Ability to work independently and in a team environment

‚Ä¢ Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail


If you have a passion for learning up-to-date modern techniques that will enhance your skills and being part of super exciting projects, and if you want to contribute to making travel experiences around the globe unforgettable, we would love to hear from you.

json.jobPosterTitle: University of West Attica - Hotel and Tourism Managment
json.companyDescription:
WHO ARE WE?
We are a team of people with one common passion: traveling to Greece and the Greek islands.
In 1999, we decided to create www.greeka.com, a travel guide about Greece and the Greek islands in order to share this passion with the world. After years of hard work, we managed to collect information and thousands of photos of Greece and the Greek islands. 
Today, Greeka.com is considered one of the top web resources in order to organize a trip to Greece and the Greek islands. More than 10 million people visit our website every year and thousands of people use our travel services.

OUR MISSION
Our mission is to promote the beauty of Greece around the world and to help people choose their dream destination in our sunny country. We offer information and photos for more than 90 locations in Greece and the Greek islands and for more than 3,000 beaches, villages and sightseeing. 
Our goal is to create the most complete website about Greece and the Greek Islands. In fact, a huge effort is made on a daily basis in order to offer the most accurate information and to make travel in Greece the experience of a lifetime. 

OUR SERVICES
> Travel services
Greeka is a company licensed by the GNTO (Greek National Tourism Organization) with the No 0207E6100025560. We propose high quality booking services to help people organize their holidays in the best way:
Hotels, Ferry tickets, Car rental, Island hopping packages, Transfers, Tours and more.

> Hotel services
Creation of quality websites, online booking engines and management tools.

WE ARE HIRING
We are getting bigger and we are looking for new talents to join our team in several departments. Check out our career opportunities on http://www.greeka.com/career.htm

json.title: Full Stack Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
ALPHA DEVELOPERS is a forward-thinking tech company focused on delivering high-quality, scalable web solutions. We are looking for an experienced Next.js & Node.js Developer with MongoDB expertise to join our project-based team and contribute to cutting-edge applications.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Build and maintain web applications using Next.js and Node.js.
  • Develop backend APIs and services with Node.js and integrate with MongoDB.
  • Optimize application performance, reliability, and security.
  • Collaborate with the team to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and improve existing codebases.


Requirements:

  • 3+ years of experience in full-stack development with Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB.
  • Strong skills in JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, and CSS.
  • Experience with RESTful APIs, authentication, and cloud deployment.
  • Proficiency with version control systems (Git).
  • Self-driven, proactive, and able to deliver on project deadlines.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.


Preferred Skills:

  • Experience with Redux, GraphQL, or other state management tools.
  • Knowledge of AWS, Docker, or CI/CD pipelines.


What We Offer:

  • Flexible hours / remote working options.
  • Opportunity to work on innovative projects with modern technologies.
  • Competitive project-based compensation.


How to Apply:

  • If you‚Äôre a skilled Next.js & Node.js Developer with MongoDB experience and ready to join Alpha Developers for an exciting project, apply via LinkedIn or send your CV to jobs@alphadevelopers.co.uk.

json.title: Senior PHP Full Stack Laravel Development Lead (Remote)
json.descriptionHtml:
We are seeking a highly experienced Senior PHP Full Stack Laravel Development Lead to join Smile and play a pivotal role across our Retail Dental Cover and Corporate Dental Cover platforms.

This role is ideal for a senior, hands-on technical leader who thrives in small, high-ownership teams, enjoys building scalable systems, and takes pride in delivering clean, reliable, and well-architected solutions.

You will be responsible for leading technical delivery, architecting and developing new features, maintaining critical infrastructure, and ensuring the scalability, performance, and security of our platforms as the business continues to grow.

AMAZING REASONS TO WORK WITH SMILE

  • 100% Remote: Enjoy the flexibility and convenience of working from anywhere.
  • Full-Time Position: Secure a stable and consistent work schedule.
  • Similar Time Zone: Work seamlessly with a team in a compatible time zone.
  • Established Company: Join a nearly 20-year-old successful & growing organisation.
  • National Presence: Be part of a national Australian company.
  • Meaningful Work: Contribute to a noble mission to revolutionise quality healthcare accessibility and affordability.
  • Top-Tier Leadership & Team: Collaborate with 'A' leadership and 'A' players, including successful Australian/Canadian Founder/CEO and an accomplished Australian COO with extensive experience building and scaling companies.
  • Excellent Culture: Thrive in a positive, supportive work environment with a long-serving team.

Responsibilities

  • Design, build, and maintain production-grade PHP/Laravel applications and scalable backend APIs for web and mobile platforms.
  • Architect and integrate secure RESTful APIs and third-party services (payments, CRMs, analytics, messaging, mapping, deep linking).
  • Deliver full-stack features using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Blade, jQuery, and modern tooling (Composer, npm, Gulp).
  • Apply advanced Git/GitHub practices, including branching, pull requests, rebasing, and code reviews in multi-developer environments.
  • Design and optimise SQL schemas and databases (PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server) following SOLID principles.
  • Implement automated testing and code quality standards using PHPUnit and linting tools.
  • Deploy and support development, staging, and production environments, including AWS infrastructure, servers, DNS, and hosting.
  • Use AI-assisted development tools responsibly to improve productivity while maintaining engineering discipline.
  • Support analytics, tracking, and growth systems, including GA4, Google Tag Manager, CRM integrations, and conversion tracking.
  • Research, evaluate, and integrate third-party tools and SDKs, ensuring technical fit and business value.
  • Produce clear technical documentation and communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Demonstrate strong ownership, accountability, and reliability, operating effectively in a high-performance remote setup.

KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS (KPIs)

  • Code Quality: Code review outcomes, test coverage, and static analysis results.
  • Delivery Time: Speed from feature initiation to production deployment.
  • Improve Sales & Customer Satisfaction: Application of best-practice e-commerce and customer experience methodologies, with customer feedback driving acquisition and retention.
  • API Performance: Reliability, response times, and error rates of REST APIs.
  • System Uptime: Hosting and infrastructure availability against uptime targets.
  • Innovation Impact: Measurable gains in efficiency and productivity through adoption of new tools and technologies.
  • Compliance Adherence: Consistent adherence to data security, privacy, and regulatory standards.
  • Collaboration & Communication: Effectiveness as a team player, including code reviews, knowledge sharing, and cross-functional engagement.
  • Ownership & Accountability: Demonstrates responsibility for outcomes, follows through on commitments, and proactively resolves issues.

Requirements

This full-time role will suit someone who meets all of the following:

  • 8‚Äì10+ years of PHP experience, with deep expertise in Laravel and backend/API development for web and mobile.
  • Strong full-stack capability across JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Blade, jQuery, and modern build tools.
  • Proven ability to design, scale, and integrate RESTful APIs and third-party services (payments, CRM, analytics, messaging, mapping).
  • Advanced Git/GitHub proficiency in collaborative, multi-developer environments.
  • Strong foundations in SQL schema design, SOLID principles, and production databases (PostgreSQL, MS SQL Server).
  • Experience with automated testing and code quality (PHPUnit, linting).
  • Hands-on experience deploying and supporting AWS-based production infrastructure.
  • Effective use of AI-assisted development tools within disciplined engineering practices.
  • Experience supporting marketing teams with analytics, tracking, and growth tooling (GA4, GTM, CRMs).
  • Ability to evaluate and integrate third-party tools and SDKs.
  • Demonstrated ability to liaise with stakeholders, plan and deliver projects, and maintain technical documentation.
  • Excellent spoken and written English in order to be able to effectively liaise with stakeholders in the region.
  • Proven ownership, accountability, and reliability, with a professional remote work setup and remote work experience..

json.companySlogan: Make your team and their families feel valued by providing enterprise dental cover!
json.companyDescription:
National Enterprise Cover

Smile provides a new era of enterprise cover to assist companies and their teams throughout Australia. Our mission is to improve the health, morale, productivity and retention of any company's most important asset, its team. The enterprise cover currently provides dental cover and is progressing to include optical, physio, chiro, podiatry and more. Cover for an employee and their family is just $99 a year.

National Dental Cover

Our mission is to improve healthcare by making quality dental care more accessible for the people of Australia. Smile is a new era of dental cover from $79 a year. Members receive reduced and capped dental fees together with no waiting periods, no exclusions, and no limits when they visit any of our 4,000+ Smile Dentists throughout Australia. Smile has over 1 million members.

National Dental Network

Smile is the largest National Dental Network in the country, preferred and no gap network. Our mission is to give practices the support, strengths and capabilities of a large organisation. Smile also directs its Members to Smile Dentists. Over 4,000 dentists and over 12,000 support team throughout Australia within metropolitan, regional, and remote areas work with Smile.

Health Fund Partnerships

Smile provides our Health Fund Partners with a preferred and no gap (optional) network. Our mission is to ensure our Health Fund Partners achieve a turn-key National Dental Network that provides reduced and capped dental fees for their Members. Smile enjoys partnerships with exceptional health funds such as GMHBA, Peoplecare, Frank, AIA, Australian Unity and Defence Health.

Projects & Investments

Smile invests actively in various vehicles including property development, commercial property, index funds, & boutique lending. Smile also invests in charitable causes that align with the spirit of its vision to be a catalyst for a healthier Australia by pioneering health solutions that achieve accessibility & inclusivity.

json.title: Lead Full Stack Engineer (.Net, Vue/React) - Full Remote
json.descriptionHtml:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us

  • Competitive Salary
  • International Environment
  • Working on the latest tech for the Insurtech Market Leader

About Us

At CoverGo, our mission is to empower all insurance companies to make insurance 100% digital and accessible to everyone.

  • We are a leading global no-code insurance platform for health, life, and P&C
  • We're the winner of the Insurtech of the Year in all of Asia and other awards globally
  • We work with insurance enterprise clients such as AXA, Bupa, MSIG, Dai-ichi, Bank of China Group Insurance, and many more
  • We're an international, diverse team of over 120 people with 30 nationalities and team members working remotely from all over the world
  • We are fully funded and backed by reputable VC funds and strategic institutional investors
  • We have a global presence in Asia, EMEA and the Americas
  • We've grown our annualized revenue by over 30x since January 2021
  • We're constantly working towards making CoverGo a workplace that you love coming to. We deeply believe that bringing together a diversity of thoughts, expressions, and perspectives is key to building the best culture for equally diverse communities all over the world

About The Role

As the Lead Full Stack Engineer, you will take on a pivotal role in guiding the design, implementation, and maintenance of our innovative SaaS platform. You will provide technical direction to the team, working across both front-end and back-end technologies, ensuring scalable and efficient software solutions. Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to understand end-user requirements, optimize application performance, and enforce best coding practices. Your role will encompass mentoring junior developers, driving innovation, and ensuring the continuous growth and success of our platform.

What You Will Do

  • Lead the design, implementation, and maintenance of our insurance enterprise software solutions, providing technical direction to the team
  • Demonstrate expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies, offering guidance on technology selection, architecture, and best practices
  • Collaborate with product, design, and engineering teams to understand requirements and technical concepts, ensuring cohesive and effective solutions with a seamless user experience
  • Optimize platform performance to handle large datasets and high user traffic, ensuring a smooth and responsive user experience
  • Conduct and lead code reviews, enforce best coding practices, and drive the adoption of standards to maintain high code quality
  • Investigate and promptly address bugs to uphold platform reliability
  • Ensure security and compliance by following best practices for securing web applications and adhering to relevant regulations
  • Stay abreast of the latest technologies, frameworks, and best practices, guiding the team in remaining competitive and innovative
  • Design the platform with scalability and flexibility, accommodating evolving features and changes as the user base grows
  • Provide mentorship and technical leadership to junior developers, fostering their growth and contribution to the team's objectives

What We Need

  • Proven experience of 8+ years as a Full Stack Engineer, with a track record of leading complex SaaS applications
  • Strong technical background with proficiency in front-end and back-end technologies, including JavaScript, Vue, .NET Core, C#, GraphQL, MongoDB, Docker
  • Strong background in RESTful API design patterns with specifications in OpenAPI and Swagger. Familiarity with API Gateways provided by cloud platforms and others.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud for building scalable applications
  • Minimum 2 years in a lead/manager role, able to guide and ensure development of teams
  • Thorough understanding and practical experience with Test-Driven Development (TDD) to ensure robust and well-tested code
  • Experience with unit, integration and function testing using front-end and back-end testing libraries
  • In-depth knowledge of web security best practices and experience in ensuring compliance with industry regulations
  • Demonstrated experience in performance optimization for high-traffic web applications
  • Experience with container technologies like Docker and a very good understanding of cloud infrastructure and solutions
  • Experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to troubleshooting and bug-fixing
  • Strong communication skills to effectively interact with both technical and non-technical team members with diverse backgrounds
  • A passion for staying updated with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in software development

Why You'll Love Working Here

  • International Environment
  • Competitive remuneration package
  • 15 Days Annual Leave
  • Annual Performance Bonus
  • Stock Options after 6 months
  • Health Insurance
  • Company activities and events
  • Learning and development plan

CoverGo Company Video

By submitting your application, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted the content of CoverGo's Privacy Notice and you consent to the processing of your data as part of this application.

json.companySlogan: The no-code platform transforming the insurance industry
json.companyDescription:
CoverGo is the leading global no-code insurance platform for health, life and P&C, enabling insurance companies to transform digitally in the most flexible, scalable and cost-effective way.

CoverGo‚Äôs platform is powered by the most comprehensive set of insurance APIs (1,000+) in the market allowing companies to integrate with other systems and create a robust insurance ecosystem.

Insurance companies use CoverGo to build and launch all types of insurance products within days, develop omni-channel distribution and digitize policy admin and claims. 

CoverGo is ISO 27001 certified and already working with insurance companies and delivery partners in Asia, USA, Canada, Latin America, MENA and other markets across the globe.

CoverGo is the global insurance technology market leader as recognized by a number of awards incl.
‚Ä¢ Global Top 100 Insurtech - Digital Insurance Agenda

‚Ä¢ Grand Fintech Prize - FIBC Japan
‚Ä¢ The Best Technology Provider to Insurance Companies ‚Äì DigFin Innovation Awards 2021
‚Ä¢ Insurtech 100 - FinTech Global 2021 & FinTech Global 2022

CoverGo is backed by leading US insurtech and fintech VC funds and strategic investors from the US, Asia, Africa, and the Middle East: 
‚Ä¢ SemperVirens VC, with our lead investor Caribou Honig
‚Ä¢ SixThirty, Tribeca Early Stage Partners and Fresco Capital
‚Ä¢ Old Mutual, Asia Financial Holdings, XN Worldwide Insurance, Noria Capital

CoverGo is also part of leading insurtech and fintech programs:

‚Ä¢ InsurTechNY
‚Ä¢ Plug & Play Insurtech Silicon Valley
‚Ä¢ InsurLab Germany
‚Ä¢ Dubai International Financial Centre Fintech
‚Ä¢ Accenture Fintech Innovation Lab APAC
‚Ä¢ Plug & Play Fintech Japan
‚Ä¢ Monetary Authority of Singapore Global Fintech Program
‚Ä¢ InsurTech Hub Munich and others

json.title: Senior Backend Developer (Nodejs / Nestjs) PAK
json.descriptionHtml:
Let's be direct: We're looking for a technical powerhouse. If you're the developer who:

  • Is the clear technical leader on your team
  • Consistently solves problems others can't crack
  • Ships complex features in half the time it takes others
  • Writes code so clean it could be published as a tutorial
  • Takes pride in elevating the entire codebase

Then we want to talk to you.

This isn't a role for everyone, and that's by design. We're seeking developers who know they're exceptional and have the track record to prove it.

Required Qualifications:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science or a related field, or equivalent experience.
  • Extensive hands-on experience with Node.js, Express.js and Nest.js
  • Hands-on Experience with GraphQL and TypeORM
  • Production experience with backend frameworks in high-scale environments
  • Expertise in relational and non-relational databases.
  • Write and maintain backend and API code to support platform functionality.
  • Ensure seamless data integration and manage relationships across complex data tables for various user roles.
  • Advanced knowledge of MongoDB and/or MySQL, with strong database design, administration, and optimization skills.
  • Strong experience in creating and consuming RESTful APIs and working with microservices architecture.
  • Proficient in client-side scripting, JavaScript frameworks, and handling cross-browser compatibility issues.
  • Experience with version control systems like Git and an understanding of CI/CD pipelines.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Expertise in TypeScript.
  • Experience in database infrastructure setup and optimization.
  • Experience with containerization technologies like Docker.
  • Familiarity with automated testing platforms, unit testing, and end-to-end testing.
  • Strong appreciation for clean, well-documented, and maintainable code.

Additional Information:

  • This is a fully remote position.
  • Compensation will be in USD.
  • Work hours are aligned with the EST time zone or PT Time Zone.

json.companySlogan: Specializes in building world-class development teams and extending runways for groundbreaking startups.
json.companyDescription:
Wizdaa, formerly known as PrideLogic, excels in creating world-class development teams and extending operational runways for innovative startups. We source, place, and pay top-tier developers who operate within U.S. time zones at highly competitive rates.

Recognizing the uniqueness of each startup, we provide tailored solutions to meet specific needs, ensuring every client receives bespoke services that drive success.

Your role will encompass mentoring junior developers, driving innovation, and ensuring the continuous growth and success of our platform.What You Will DoLead the design, implementation, and maintenance of our insurance enterprise software solutions, providing technical direction to the teamDemonstrate expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies, offering guidance on technology selection, architecture, and best practicesCollaborate with product, design, and engineering teams to understand requirements and technical concepts, ensuring cohesive and effective solutions with a seamless user experienceOptimize platform performance to handle large datasets and high user traffic, ensuring a smooth and responsive user experienceConduct and lead code reviews, enforce best coding practices, and drive the adoption of standards to maintain high code qualityInvestigate and promptly address bugs to uphold platform reliabilityEnsure security and compliance by following best practices for securing web applications and adhering to relevant regulationsStay abreast of the latest technologies, frameworks, and best practices, guiding the team in remaining competitive and innovativeDesign the platform with scalability and flexibility, accommodating evolving features and changes as the user base growsProvide mentorship and technical leadership to junior developers, fostering their growth and contribution to the team's objectivesWhat We NeedProven experience of 8+ years as a Full Stack Engineer, with a track record of leading complex SaaS applicationsStrong technical background with proficiency in front-end and back-end technologies, including JavaScript, Vue, .NET Core, C#, GraphQL, MongoDB, DockerStrong background in RESTful API design patterns with specifications in OpenAPI and Swagger. Familiarity with API Gateways provided by cloud platforms and others. Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud for building scalable applicationsMinimum 2 years in a lead/manager role, able to guide and ensure development of teamsThorough understanding and practical experience with Test-Driven Development (TDD) to ensure robust and well-tested codeExperience with unit, integration and function testing using front-end and back-end testing librariesIn-depth knowledge of web security best practices and experience in ensuring compliance with industry regulationsDemonstrated experience in performance optimization for high-traffic web applicationsExperience with container technologies like Docker and a very good understanding of cloud infrastructure and solutionsExperience in collaborating with cross-functional teamsExcellent problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to troubleshooting and bug-fixingStrong communication skills to effectively interact with both technical and non-technical team members with diverse backgroundsA passion for staying updated with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in software developmentWhy You'll Love Working HereInternational EnvironmentCompetitive remuneration package15 Days Annual LeaveAnnual Performance BonusStock Options after 6 monthsHealth InsuranceCompany activities and eventsLearning and development planCoverGo Company VideoBy submitting your application, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted the content of CoverGo's Privacy Notice and you consent to the processing of your data as part of this application.

json.title: Remote Fullstack Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
A respected US-based client is looking for a Full-stack Developer to join their dynamic team.

This chance is perfect for professionals who thrive on creating innovative solutions and aspire to stay ahead in AI advancement. Collaborate with various companies focused on developing cutting-edge AI solutions for commercial and research objectives.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Apply Python and/or Javascript/Typescript knowledge to solve challenges while integrating business intelligence to optimize code functionality and operational efficiency.
  • Maintain open lines of communication with stakeholders to align efforts with organizational goals.
  • Create reliable response mechanisms using scripting or algorithms to handle user interactions effectively.
  • Help with troubleshooting initiatives, documenting issues, and providing solutions to ensure accurate output validation.
  • Engage in meaningful discussions with researchers to grasp their needs and deliver impactful insights.

Job Requirements:

  • Open to applicants at all career stages, from newcomers to experienced professionals.
  • Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical field required.
  • Familiar with software engineering best practices.
  • Knowledgeable in Python, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
  • Able to communicate effectively in both spoken and written English.

Job Benefits:

  • Collaborate with top experts globally and join a network aligned with your goals.
  • Enjoy the flexibility of remote work without traditional job constraints.
  • Competitive salary based on global standards in USD.
  • Contribute to groundbreaking projects that push technological boundaries and keep you ahead in your field.

Selection Process:

  • Shortlisted developers may be asked to complete an assessment.
  • If you clear the assessment, you will be contacted for contract assignments with expected start dates, durations, and end dates.
  • Some contract assignments require fixed weekly hours, averaging 20/30/40 hours per week for the duration of the contract assignment.

json.companySlogan: Accelerating Superintelligence & building proprietary intelligence for enterprises. AI powered, human led
json.companyDescription:
Turing is one of the world‚Äôs fastest-growing AI companies accelerating the advancement and deployment of powerful AI systems.

Turing helps customers in two ways: Working with the world‚Äôs leading AI labs to advance frontier model capabilities in thinking, reasoning, coding, agentic behavior, multimodality, multilinguality, STEM and frontier knowledge; and leveraging that work to build real-world AI systems that solve mission-critical priorities for companies.

Powering this growth is Turing‚Äôs talent cloud‚Äîan AI-vetted pool of 4M+ software engineers, data scientists, and STEM experts who can train models and build AI applications. All of this is orchestrated by ALAN‚Äîour AI-powered platform for matching and managing talent, and generating high-quality human and synthetic data to improve model performance. ALAN also accelerates workflows for model and agent evals, supervised fine-tuning, reinforcement learning, reinforcement learning with human feedback, preference-pair generation, benchmarking, data capture for pre-training, post-training, and building AI applications.

Turing‚Äîbased in San Francisco, California‚Äîwas named #1 on The Information‚Äôs annual list of ‚ÄúTop 50 Most Promising B2B Companies,‚Äù and has been profiled by Fast Company, TechCrunch, Reuters, Semafor, VentureBeat, Entrepreneur, CNBC, Forbes, and many others. Turing‚Äôs leadership team includes AI technologists from Meta, Google, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, X, Stanford, Caltech, and MIT.

json.title: Senior Backend Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
About The Role

Our backend powers complex workflows across jobs, interviews, sourcing, and AI-driven insights. As we expand these capabilities, we‚Äôre strengthening our architecture and introducing new patterns to support scale and speed. We‚Äôre hiring a Senior Backend Engineer who enjoys solving real product challenges, shaping reliable systems, and helping a team level up.

Your work will influence how our backend grows ‚Äî improving performance, modularity, and developer experience ‚Äî while delivering new features that matter to our customers.

This is a role for someone who values doing the right thing, moves with high velocity, communicates clearly

What You‚Äôll Work On

  • Build backend features using Node.js / NestJS with clean, scalable patterns
  • Improve backend structure, modularity, and data flows
  • Implement API endpoints and business logic with clarity and maintainability
  • Review code and guide engineers toward better patterns
  • Collaborate with frontend, product, and AI teams to design efficient solutions
  • Identify small improvements that increase developer velocity
  • Strengthen error handling, validation, and domain clarity across the backend
  • Help the team avoid new tech debt while delivering fast

Requirements

  • Strong experience with NestJS
  • Deep understanding of backend architecture patterns:
    • Modular monolith
    • Service + repository layering
    • Dependency injection
    • DTOs & validation
  • Solid experience designing reliable, high-quality APIs
  • Strong debugging, problem-solving, and code-organization skills
  • Ability to guide other developers and establish patterns
  • Experience with PostgreSQL, and MongoDB
  • Experience improving backend performance or resolving bottlenecks
  • Experience in event-driven or modular architectures
  • Experience in AI-powered products (Claude, Cursor, Copilot)

json.title: SU - Full-Stack Developer
json.descriptionHtml:
Role Description

This is a full-time remote role for a Full-Stack Developer at a growing US based company. The Full-Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining both front-end and back-end systems for web and mobile applications. The role involves integrating APIs, managing databases, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth and efficient functionality across the stack.

Qualifications

  • 2-3 years of professional experience working as a Full-Stack Developer.
  • Proficiency in front-end technologies such as JavaScript, React.js, React Native, HTML5, and CSS3.
  • Expertise in back-end development using Node.js, Python, Ruby on Rails, or Java.
  • Experience building and integrating RESTful APIs and microservices.
  • Strong proficiency with databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, or MongoDB.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) and deploying scalable applications.
  • Knowledge of security practices, including data protection, authentication, and authorization.
  • Experience with containerization (e.g., Docker) and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Ability to work effectively in a remote, cross-functional team and communicate clearly in a distributed environment.
  • A bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.

Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and maintain both front-end and back-end systems for web and mobile applications.
  • Build responsive, high-performance user interfaces using JavaScript, React.js, or React Native.
  • Develop robust, scalable back-end services using Node.js, Python, Ruby on Rails, or Java.
  • Integrate RESTful APIs and microservices to enable smooth functionality between client-side and server-side operations.
  • Manage databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB) and ensure secure, efficient data handling.
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams, including front-end, back-end, DevOps, and product management, to deliver seamless features.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues on both the front-end and back-end, ensuring optimal 
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest development trends and apply best practices to improve processes on both sides of the stack.

Compensation

$2,000 - $6,000 per month, paid in USD depending on experience.

Details

  • Independent contractor agreement paid 2x monthly.
  • Client has a desire for long term commitment.

Support Shepherd is now Somewhere!

Trusted by top brands and entrepreneurs for effortless and efficient global hiring solutions.

The problem is you want to expand your team with quality talent, but you're facing:

You have a tough decision: either stretch your budget for top local talent or compromise on quality with underqualified hires, slowing your growth. 

Facing this alone is hard:

Somwhere is your partner for hassle-free, global talent acquisition. We connect you with skilled, cost-effective staff from the Philippines and Latin America, perfectly matching your business needs.

How it works:

With Somewhere, choosing between expensive local talent or underqualified hires is a thing of the past. We offer a third option: affordable, skilled, and reliable international talent.

Join top entrepreneurs and industry leaders ‚Äì Schedule your call for the perfect hire, Guaranteed! 

Our team is ready to help you define your needs, build your job description, and secure your next great hire.

json.title: Full Stack Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
Who We Are Is What We Do.

Deel is the all-in-one payroll and HR platform for global teams. Our vision is to unlock global opportunity for every person, team, and business. Built for the way the world works today, Deel combines HRIS, payroll, compliance, benefits, performance, and equipment management into one seamless platform. With AI-powered tools and a fully owned payroll infrastructure, Deel supports every worker type in 150+ countries‚Äîhelping businesses scale smarter, faster, and more compliantly.

Among the largest globally distributed companies in the world, our team of 7,000 spans more than 100 countries, speaks 74 languages, and brings a connected and dynamic culture that drives continuous learning and innovation for our customers.

Why should you be part of our success story?

As the fastest-growing Software as a Service (SaaS) company in history, Deel is transforming how global talent connects with world-class companies ‚Äì breaking down borders that have traditionally limited both hiring and career opportunities. We're not just building software; we're creating the infrastructure for the future of work, enabling a more diverse and inclusive global economy. In 2024 alone, we paid $11.2 billion to workers in nearly 100 currencies and provided healthcare and benefits to workers in 109 countries‚Äîensuring people get paid and protected, no matter where they are.

Our momentum is reflected in our achievements and customer satisfaction: CNBC Disruptor 50, Forbes Cloud 100, Deloitte Fast 500, and repeated recognition on Y Combinator‚Äôs top companies list ‚Äì all while maintaining a 4.83 average rating from 15,000 reviews across G2, Trustpilot, Captera, Apple and Google.

Your experience at Deel will be a career accelerator. At the forefront of the global work revolution, you'll tackle complex challenges that impact millions of people's working lives. With our momentum‚Äîbacked by a $17.3 billion valuation and $1 B in Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) in just over five years‚Äîyou'll drive meaningful impact while building expertise that makes you a sought-after leader in the transformation of global work.

Get ready to:

  • Be a part of a truly cross-functional team; Backend Engineers, Frontend Engineers, Product Teams, Designers and QA‚Äôs.
  • Participate in product planning (From discovery all the way to deployment); We want your input at all stages of the Software Development Lifecycle!
  • Collaborate! Our teams work together to develop robust new features, API‚Äôs, continuously improve our industry-leading products and find and fix any bugs at DeelSpeed.
  • Ensure our customers receive a white-glove experience with our products!
  • Fully own the development of features on the client, server, service, and database

The bits and bytes that you‚Äôll bring to your new team:

  • You will develop high-quality, responsive web applications using TypeScript, Javascript, React, Express. Experience with NestJS, Vite, and Next.js is a plus.
  • You will design and implement server-side APIs, data models, and business logic using mainly Express framework
  • You will create client-side function-based React components, hooks, stories, and tests to interact with your server-side work
  • You will create and optimize database schemas, queries, and interactions with Postgres.
  • You will build reusable and modular components on both the front and back end that promote code reusability, maintainability, and scalability.
  • You will perform thorough testing, debugging, and troubleshooting of applications to ensure high-quality deliverables.
  • You will stay updated with emerging web development trends, frameworks, and best practices, and recommend improvements to enhance development processes.
  • You will participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members to maintain code quality standards.
  • You will communicate project progress, challenges, and solutions effectively to team members and stakeholders.
  • Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes, methodologies, and tools. You're the Engineer we're looking for if you:
  • At least 4 years of Full-Stack experience, with a focus on TypeScript development.
  • Expert in the art of designing, coding, testing, and maintaining applications using the tech listed above.
  • Thrive in a collaborative, remote-first work culture where teamwork and camaraderie are key.
  • Embrace independence and take ownership of your projects, yet also excel in a team setting and love to contribute.
  • Communicate complex ideas with ease and enjoy collaborating with diverse teams of technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Are passionate about solving customer problems with your coding superpowers, and are a natural at troubleshooting issues.
  • Take a business-focused approach to software development, with a keen eye on delivering high-value outcomes for our clients.
  • Obsess over details, and always keep the customer experience top of mind.

Extra brownie points if you:

  • Have experience with SaaS products running 24/7 on a major cloud vendor.
  • Solid understanding of RESTful APIs, microservices architecture, and asynchronous programming.
  • Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, Mocha, Chai, Storybook, React Testing Library) and automated testing methodologies (Cypress).
  • Knowledge of containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)

Total Rewards

Our workforce deserves fair and competitive pay that meets them where they are. With scalable benefits, rewards, and perks, our total rewards programs reflect our commitment to inclusivity and access for all.

Some things you‚Äôll enjoy

  • Stock grant opportunities dependent on your role, employment status and location
  • Additional perks and benefits based on your employment status and country
  • The flexibility of remote work, including optional WeWork access

At Deel, we‚Äôre an equal-opportunity employer that values diversity and positively encourage applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of race, religion, sex, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, pregnancy or maternity or other applicable legally protected characteristics.

Unless otherwise agreed, we will communicate with job applicants using Deel-specific emails, which include @deel.com and other acquired company emails like @payspace.com and @paygroup.com. You can view the most up-to-date job listings at Deel by visiting our careers page.

Deel is an equal-opportunity employer and is committed to cultivating a diverse and inclusive workplace that reflects different abilities, backgrounds, beliefs, experiences, identities and perspectives.

Deel will provide accommodations on request throughout the recruitment, selection and assessment process for applicants with disabilities. If you require accommodations, please inform our Talent Acquisition Team via this link and a team member will be in touch to ensure your equal participation. If you have difficulty accessing the form, please email at recruiting@deel.com.

We use Covey as part of our hiring and/or promotional processes. As part of the evaluation process, we provide Covey with job requirements and candidate-submitted applications. Certain features of the platform may qualify it as an Automated Employment Decision Tool (AEDT) under applicable regulations. For positions in New York City, our use of Covey complies with NYC Local Law 144.

We began using Covey Scout for Inbound on March 30, 2025.

For more information about our data protection practices, please visit our Privacy Policy. You can review the independent bias audit report covering our use of Covey here: https://getcovey.com/nyc-local-law-144

json.title: Senior Developer (Laravel | NestJs | Next.js | Devops)
json.descriptionHtml:
Senior Full-Stack Developer (Laravel | NestJS | Next.js | GraphQL | PostgreSQL)

‚ö†Ô∏è Please do not apply if you do not meet the qualifications listed below.


We are looking for an experienced Full-Stack Developer who is highly skilled in Laravel, NestJS, Next.js, GraphQL, and PostgreSQL. This is a full-time role for a candidate who can design, develop, and optimize scalable, SEO-friendly, and high-performance applications from the backend to the frontend.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain backend applications using Laravel and NestJS.
  • Build frontend interfaces and server-side rendering applications using Next.js.
  • Design, optimize, and maintain PostgreSQL relational databases with a focus on performance and scalability.
  • Implement and manage GraphQL APIs for efficient client-server communication.
  • Ensure SEO-friendly architecture and technical SEO optimizations (page speed, structured data, indexing, Core Web Vitals).
  • Optimize queries and application performance using Eloquent ORM and other tools.
  • Manage Redis cache strategies and implement performance enhancements.
  • Handle Dockerized development and production environments, including multi-stage builds and image optimization.
  • Manage CI/CD pipelines, deployments, environment, and secret management.
  • Actively participate in technical and architectural decision-making.
  • Perform production-level maintenance, refactoring, and updates without causing system downtime.


Requirements:

  • Minimum 5 years of Laravel experience.
  • Strong experience with NestJS, Next.js, and GraphQL.
  • Advanced SQL and relational database design skills, specifically with PostgreSQL.
  • Strong technical SEO knowledge and experience implementing SEO best practices.
  • Experience with Eloquent ORM performance optimization.
  • Solid DevOps skills, including CI/CD, deployment, and Linux server management.
  • Experience with Docker, multi-stage builds, and containerized environments.
  • Knowledge of Redis and caching strategies.
  • Strong understanding of code quality, security, and performance optimization.


Preferred (Not Required):

  • Experience with Kubernetes or container orchestration.
  • Experience with queues, jobs, and microservices architectures.


Work Conditions:

  • Full-time position, 6 days per week.
  • The salary will be starting from 1400$/month
  • Remote work via Zoom live screen sharing.
  • Immediate availability preferred.
  • Candidates will be given a technical task to evaluate skills. AI-assisted task submissions will be rejected.

json.title: Full Stack Engineer, LearnWith.AI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
json.descriptionHtml:
We're seeking a Full-Stack Engineer who excels at tackling intricate technical problems and shipping features that matter. In this role, you'll contribute to cutting-edge AI-driven products that reshape how individuals learn and develop. Your work will center on delivering excellence‚Äîbuilding systems that scale, remain maintainable, and create meaningful impact.

Our Products Are Redefining The Learning Landscape

  • TeachTap: Uses AI to animate historical figures within a TikTok-style educational platform.
  • TeachTales: Captivates learners through personalized, enchanting narratives that enhance understanding.
  • TimeBack: Functions as an intelligent learning assistant, embedding into current applications to provide proactive student coaching.
  • Athena: Employs AI-generated video content and assessments to produce quantifiable educational results.

This position is designed to create tangible impact through functional software. You'll leverage AI-assisted development tools and cloud-native infrastructure to construct full-stack solutions addressing substantive challenges‚Äînot simply completing task lists. Expect to deploy rapidly while maintaining quality, selecting the most straightforward appropriate approach that reconciles immediate velocity with sustained maintainability.

If you're prepared to navigate sophisticated technical obstacles and deliver features with measurable impact, we want to connect with you.

What You Will Be Doing

  • Develop and Deploy Complete Features: Guide user stories from concept through production impact; refine specifications, architect scalable implementations, implement both server-side and client-side logic, validate thoroughly, and release to live environments
  • Identify and Resolve Defects: Diagnose problems using root cause methodology, address underlying issues (rather than surface symptoms), and prevent future regressions through strategic testing
  • Elevate Engineering Standards: Assess technical plans and code submissions to verify clarity, simplicity, and correctness, preventing technical debt accumulation from the outset

What You Won‚Äôt Be Doing

  • Creating pixel-perfect interfaces or intricate backend systems as ends in themselves
  • Executing specifications mechanically without grasping the underlying challenge
  • Spending excessive time in meetings debating roadmaps and priorities or tracking down stakeholders
  • Simply delivering features; your accountability extends to solving genuine user problems

Full Stack Engineer Key Responsibilities

  • Applying AI to create software that addresses authentic user needs, deploys quickly, and remains sustainable over time

Basic Requirements

  • A minimum of 4 years writing production-grade code for both frontend and backend components of web applications (framework-agnostic).
  • Proven ownership: Track record of owning entire modules, product capabilities, or teams‚Äîbeyond isolated task execution
  • Self-directed execution: Capacity to remove your own blockers, establish your own rhythm, and navigate forward through uncertain conditions
  • Practical experience incorporating generative A.I. into your regular development workflow

About LearnWith.AI

LearnWith.AI is an edtech startup that leverages AI and subject matter experts to cultivate a new way of learning. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and AI-powered coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn more, learn faster, and learn better - and have fun while doing it. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with us

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover as a Contractor of Record. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

Crossover Job Code: LJ-4774-PK-Lahore-FullStackEngin.018

Allow us to clarify some common misconceptions:
1) The reason we post so many job ads is because LinkedIn organizes all job postings by location. So, the only way to reach candidates all over the world is to post multiple ads in every city you want to hire from. Most recruiters don't bother because it's too time consuming... but we're not most recruiters.
2) We mostly recruit independent contractors, not employees, because labor laws vary so much from one country to another that it's near-impossible to recruit globally otherwise (which is why it's still uncommon even though most jobs can now be done remotely).
3) As is standard for any self-employed person, the stated pay is the entire compensation package. Because they are not employees, each contractor is responsible for handling the things that an employer would take care of e.g. taxes, equipment, vacation time, health insurance. One of the major reasons that Crossover jobs pay so much more than local jobs is to overcompensate for these costs.

It's hard, but it's worth it!

json.title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer, IgniteTech (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
json.descriptionHtml:
The software development sector is undergoing rapid transformation, fueled by the need to accelerate development cycles, minimize human error, and improve code quality. These improvements are critical because they directly impact product time-to-market and customer satisfaction. Historically, software deployment timelines have been hindered by conventional coding methodologies, with approximately 30% of projects running over schedule due to inefficiencies and errors.

IgniteTech is spearheading this transformation by incorporating cutting-edge GenAI technologies to reshape software architecture and development practices. Rather than focusing on incremental progress, this position provides the exciting prospect of driving major AI-powered initiatives. You will operate at the vanguard of AI integration, not merely improving but fundamentally transforming software development workflows and results, delivering substantial gains in efficiency and strategic competitiveness.

This position is tailored for individuals committed to operating at the forefront of technological innovation. It is not simply an operational or task-execution role; it is a strategic position involving comprehensive research and development, prototyping, and the deployment of AI in building next-generation software products. The ideal candidate possesses not only technical proficiency in AI and software architecture but also a visionary mindset for applying technology to drive business innovation.

In this capacity, you will guide our team in establishing the architectural foundations and strategies that embed AI into our software offerings. This position is central to our objectives, and your contributions will have a direct bearing on the productivity and quality of our outputs. We encourage you to apply if you are committed to expanding the frontiers of technology and motivated to deliver measurable impact within the software industry.

What You Will Be Doing

  • Architect comprehensive frameworks for AI-powered systems that automate sophisticated elements of software development, including architecture generation, dependency management, and advanced predictive coding capabilities.
  • Engage deeply with emerging trends in AI and software engineering through R&D activities, conference participation, and collaboration with academic and professional networks. When new AI technologies emerge, we must be positioned among the earliest adopters.

What You Won‚Äôt Be Doing

  • Routine Code Maintenance: Regularly updating or debugging existing software code to address minor issues or enhance functionality.
  • Standard Software Development: Basic coding or software development activities that involve implementing straightforward features or functionalities without AI integration.

Artificial Intelligence Engineer Key Responsibilities

  • Apply your engineering capabilities to achieve substantial gains in development velocity, reduction in human error, and enhancement of code quality, ultimately accelerating time-to-market for software products and improving customer satisfaction.

Basic Requirements

  • A minimum of 3 years of experience as a full-stack software developer (you must possess both front-end and back-end coding expertise)
  • Extensive experience using GenAI code assistants (e.g., Github Copilot, Cursor.sh, v0.dev)
  • Prior experience successfully deploying Generative AI products/projects/solutions/tools
  • Prior experience utilizing different LLMs (e.g., GPT, Claude, Mistral) to address business challenges
  • A clear understanding of when and why to select specific LLM models for different tasks
  • Proven understanding and previous application of the Model Context Protocol (MCP)

About IgniteTech

World-class talent. 100% global remote.

Ready to be a part of the top talent that IgniteTech has curated from thousands of applicants throughout the world? Come join us.

Through our portfolio of leading enterprise software solutions, we ignite business performance for thousands of customers globally. We‚Äôre big believers in the remote-work-from-anywhere lifestyle, which creates freedom for our team members and enables us to hire the best and brightest from around the world. A career with IgniteTech is challenging and fast-paced and we‚Äôre always looking for energetic and enthusiastic team members.

We‚Äôre an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity employer and we value the strength that diversity brings to our workplace.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with us

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover as a Contractor of Record. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

Crossover Job Code: LJ-5269-PK-KarƒÅchi-ArtificialInte.011
