json.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer, LearnWith.AI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
json.descriptionHtml:
This role is designed for exceptional engineers who value ownership, strategic impact, and solving demanding technical problems. You will be responsible for developing the product's most critical features while guiding its technical trajectory and maintaining its long-term resilience and expansion. The technical choices you make will have direct consequences for the product and its user base, providing you with freedom to experiment and accountability to execute.

The Products You'll Contribute To Are Reshaping Education

  • TeachTap: Uses AI to animate historical figures within a TikTok-style learning interface.
  • TeachTales: Captivates students through customized, immersive storytelling that enhances understanding.
  • TimeBack: Functions as a learning assistant that connects with existing applications, offering proactive student guidance.
  • Athena: Employs AI-created videos and assessments to produce concrete academic results.

Your work will steer the technical progression of our products, making certain they remain scalable, maintainable, and resilient over time. Working in close partnership with product teams, you will convert broad requirements into technical architecture decisions and address intricate challenges while upholding rigorous quality benchmarks. The choices you make will define the product's trajectory and affect how thousands of students engage with learning material.

We emphasize deliberate planning and early-stage design. Our AI-first methodology automates repetitive work, allowing you to concentrate on consequential decisions and complex problem-solving. You will enjoy significant autonomy and the capacity to shape product strategy while prioritizing enduring stability and scalability.

If you are prepared to guide the technical advancement of our SaaS products and apply generative AI to expand what's possible, we encourage you to apply.

What You Will Be Doing

  • Feature Development: Architecting and building new features with emphasis on scalability, maintainability, and sustained product value.
  • Requirement Engineering: Partnering with the product team to clarify requirements and guiding technical conversations to ensure features align with product objectives.
  • Operations and Maintenance: Overseeing and sustaining product reliability, optimizing performance, and proactively detecting and addressing issues.
  • Technical Design: Making high-stakes technical choices that directly influence user experience and product scalability.

What You Won‚Äôt Be Doing

  • Jumping between short-lived projects or pursuing the latest hype-driven technology fad.
  • Contributing to internal IT infrastructure or outsourced initiatives that lack tangible user impact.
  • Spending time in unproductive meetings or troubleshooting monotonous infrastructure problems.

Basic Requirements

Senior Full-Stack Engineer key responsibilities

  • At least 1 year of full-stack development experience, working on front and backend features.
  • At least 2 years as the primary technical contributor for a SaaS product, driving strategic technical decisions.
  • At least 4 years of experience working on actual SaaS products, not outsourcing or internal IT projects.
  • Experience in using generative AI in your day-to-day development work.

About LearnWith.AI

LearnWith.AI is an edtech startup that leverages AI and subject matter experts to cultivate a new way of learning. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and AI-powered coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn more, learn faster, and learn better - and have fun while doing it. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with us

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover as a Contractor of Record. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

json.title: Full Stack Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
Job Title

Full-Stack Developer (Flutter + .NET)

Overview

We‚Äôre building a mobile-first product with a Flutter frontend and a .NET backend, heavily augmented by AI. We‚Äôre looking for a full-stack developer who can ship end-to-end features and fully leverage AI tools to move faster, design better systems, and reduce manual work.

This role expects you to treat AI as a daily productivity multiplier, not a novelty.

Responsibilities
  • Build and maintain Flutter mobile features (iOS & Android)
  • Design and implement .NET (ASP.NET Core) backend APIs
  • Work with PostgreSQL (or similar relational databases)
  • Integrate third-party APIs and internal services
  • Design clean data flows between mobile, backend, and AI services
  • Use AI tools to:
  • Accelerate feature development
  • Generate, refactor, and review code
  • Assist with system design and debugging
  • Collaborate on architecture decisions with a bias toward simplicity and scalability
  • Own features end-to-end, from idea to production
Required Skills
  • Strong production experience with Flutter (Dart)
  • Solid experience with C# / .NET (ASP.NET Core)
  • REST API design and implementation
  • Relational database experience (Postgres, SQL Server, etc.)
  • Git and modern CI/CD workflows
  • Ability to independently deliver complete features
AI-Specific Requirements (Important)

You must be comfortable and proactive with AI-assisted development, including:

  • Daily use of tools like Claude AI (or equivalent LLMs)
  • Experience or strong interest in multi-agent AI workflows (e.g. using agents for planning, coding, testing, refactoring, analysis)
  • Using AI to:
  • Break down complex tasks
  • Explore multiple implementation approaches
  • Improve code quality and speed of delivery
  • Understanding AI limitations and validating outputs (not blindly copy-pasting)

You don‚Äôt need to be an ‚ÄúAI researcher,‚Äù but you do need to think in terms of human + AI as a system.

  • Experience integrating LLMs into products or internal tooling
  • Familiarity with background jobs, queues, or async processing
  • Docker / containerized deployments
  • Cloud experience (AWS / Azure / GCP)
  • Experience working in small, fast-moving teams
What We Value
  • Builders who bias toward execution
  • Simple, scalable solutions over clever abstractions
  • High ownership and accountability
  • Clear thinking and clean code
  • Using AI to remove bottlenecks, not add complexity
Work Style
  • Small team
  • High autonomy
  • Minimal meetings
  • Focus on shipping real product, fast

"<html>
# M NAUMAN CHAUDHRY
Islamabad, 44000, PK | +92 305 5712534 | nauman@iamnauman.com | linkedin.com/in/naumanch |
github.com/naumanch969 | www.iamnauman.com

# PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Full-Stack Engineer with 4+ years of experience specializing in AI-driven applications and scalable multi-role SaaS platforms. Proven track record in end-to-end feature development, from architectural design to deployment, with a focus on delivering measurable impact and solving complex user problems. Expert in Next.js, React, Node.js, and integrating cutting-edge AI (OpenAI, Gemini, LangChain) to build robust, maintainable, and high-performance production systems.

# SKILLS
*   **Core Full Stack**: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/UI, Redux, responsive UI
*   **AI & Machine Learning**: OpenAI, Gemini API, LangChain, AI-native app development, generative AI workflow integration, Computer Vision (TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenCV)
*   **Backend & Database**: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Supabase, Prisma, Firebase, REST APIs, Socket.IO (real-time features)
*   **Deployment & DevOps**: Git, GitHub, Vercel, Netlify, Docker, CI/CD, Performance Optimization (40%+ latency reduction, 99.9% uptime)
*   **Product & Ownership**: Strategic Leadership, Product Ownership, Cross-Functional Collaboration, User Journey Definition, Roadmap Management
*   **Other**: React Native, Expo, Multi-tenant SaaS, Payment Integration (Stripe), Figma, Clerk

# PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
## Software Engineer. Remote
Codic Solutions | February 2024 - Present
*   Delivered 10+ scalable full-stack web and mobile applications for international clients, focusing on SaaS, e-commerce, and data-driven dashboards.
*   Led end-to-end feature development and deployment for flagship projects (e.g., Evaluate, Kaffy), ensuring robust frontend and backend implementations.
*   Designed and built complex role-based dashboards and integrated critical APIs, maintaining high standards for mobile-web synchronization and system maintainability.

## Full-Stack Developer / Lead Engineer. Remote
QanoonMate (Opstin Technologies) | Jan 2025 ‚Äì Present
*   As Lead Engineer, owned end-to-end development of QanoonMate, an AI-powered legal SaaS platform, delivering 5+ services (chatbots, document summarization, consultation portals) to students, lawyers, and clients.
*   Architected and implemented AI workflows into production features, managing both frontend and backend systems, demonstrating practical experience with generative A.I. in a regular development workflow.
*   Spearheaded real-time interaction capabilities via Socket.IO and integrated robust role-based authentication and payment systems, demonstrating full ownership from concept to deployment.

## Full Stack Developer. Remote
A Dot Consultant | September 2023 - January 2024
*   Owned the full-stack development and maintenance of a custom CRM dashboard (React, Node.js), enhancing data visibility and real-time updates to reduce client response times by 40%.
*   Architected and integrated 6+ REST APIs (email, calendar, analytics) to automate client operations, eliminating approximately 75% of manual data entry.
*   Centralized 8+ CRM services to streamline cross-department workflows, significantly improving data accuracy and operational efficiency while ensuring end-to-end frontend and backend integrity.

# FLAGSHIP PROJECTS
## Evaluate
Global School Evaluation Platform
*   Developed a multi-role SaaS platform (admin, evaluator, instructor, parent, student, school) for schools across Bahrain & the Gulf, focusing on scalable system architecture.
*   Engineered comprehensive admin and user dashboards, invitation systems, and robust data pipelines for aggregating responses into detailed evaluation reports.
*   Handled complex scoring engine calculations, integrating inputs from multiple actors, and unified web & mobile clients to ensure consistent, maintainable functionality.

## Kaffy
Flower Selling Platform
*   Built a full-stack mobile & web marketplace for flower delivery with multi-role support (customers, delivery, admin), emphasizing rapid deployment and high quality.
*   Developed dynamic storefronts, product catalog, order management, and real-time order tracking, integrating Stripe payments and secure authentication.
*   Implemented role-based dashboards for admin and delivery personnel, connecting frontend and backend with real-time APIs to ensure seamless order updates and notifications, delivering tangible impact.

## TrainityHub
AI-Powered Fitness Growth Platform | Work-in-Progress
*   Designed and developed TrainityHub, a modular SaaS platform for fitness, featuring multi-role support and subscription tiers.
*   Engineered complex, responsive front-end UI and dashboards with Next.js and React, optimized for performance and user experience.
*   Architected the system with a focus on scalability and future AI integration, including planned features for AI-driven body form correction and personalized growth recommendations, aligning with modern learning and development paradigms.

# EDUCATION
## Bachelor of Engineering in Software Engineering
National University of Sciences and Technology - Islamabad
## Intermediate in Computer Science
Government College University - Lahore

# CERTIFICATES
*   Career Essentials in Software Development (Microsoft)

"<html>
# M NAUMAN CHAUDHRY
Islamabad, 44000, PK | +92 305 5712534 | nauman@iamnauman.com | linkedin.com/in/naumanch |
github.com/naumanch969 | www.iamnauman.com

# PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Full-Stack Engineer with 4+ years of experience specializing in AI-driven applications and scalable multi-role SaaS platforms. Proven track record in end-to-end feature development, from architectural design to deployment, with a focus on delivering measurable impact and solving complex user problems. Expert in Next.js, React, Node.js, and integrating cutting-edge AI (OpenAI, Gemini, LangChain) to build robust, maintainable, and high-performance production systems.

# SKILLS
*   **Core Full Stack**: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/UI, Redux, responsive UI
*   **AI & Machine Learning**: OpenAI, Gemini API, LangChain, AI-native app development, generative AI workflow integration, Computer Vision (TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenCV)
*   **Backend & Database**: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Supabase, Prisma, Firebase, REST APIs, Socket.IO (real-time features)
*   **Deployment & DevOps**: Git, GitHub, Vercel, Netlify, Docker, CI/CD, Performance Optimization (40%+ latency reduction, 99.9% uptime)
*   **Product & Ownership**: Strategic Leadership, Product Ownership, Cross-Functional Collaboration, User Journey Definition, Roadmap Management
*   **Other**: React Native, Expo, Multi-tenant SaaS, Payment Integration (Stripe), Figma, Clerk

# PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
## Software Engineer. Remote
Codic Solutions | February 2024 - Present
*   Delivered 10+ scalable full-stack web and mobile applications for international clients, focusing on SaaS, e-commerce, and data-driven dashboards.
*   Led end-to-end feature development and deployment for flagship projects (e.g., Evaluate, Kaffy), ensuring robust frontend and backend implementations.
*   Designed and built complex role-based dashboards and integrated critical APIs, maintaining high standards for mobile-web synchronization and system maintainability.

## Full-Stack Developer / Lead Engineer. Remote
QanoonMate (Opstin Technologies) | Jan 2025 ‚Äì Present
*   As Lead Engineer, owned end-to-end development of QanoonMate, an AI-powered legal SaaS platform, delivering 5+ services (chatbots, document summarization, consultation portals) to students, lawyers, and clients.
*   Architected and implemented AI workflows into production features, managing both frontend and backend systems, demonstrating practical experience with generative A.I. in a regular development workflow.
*   Spearheaded real-time interaction capabilities via Socket.IO and integrated robust role-based authentication and payment systems, demonstrating full ownership from concept to deployment.

## Full Stack Developer. Remote
A Dot Consultant | September 2023 - January 2024
*   Owned the full-stack development and maintenance of a custom CRM dashboard (React, Node.js), enhancing data visibility and real-time updates to reduce client response times by 40%.
*   Architected and integrated 6+ REST APIs (email, calendar, analytics) to automate client operations, eliminating approximately 75% of manual data entry.
*   Centralized 8+ CRM services to streamline cross-department workflows, significantly improving data accuracy and operational efficiency while ensuring end-to-end frontend and backend integrity.

# FLAGSHIP PROJECTS
## Evaluate
Global School Evaluation Platform
*   Developed a multi-role SaaS platform (admin, evaluator, instructor, parent, student, school) for schools across Bahrain & the Gulf, focusing on scalable system architecture.
*   Engineered comprehensive admin and user dashboards, invitation systems, and robust data pipelines for aggregating responses into detailed evaluation reports.
*   Handled complex scoring engine calculations, integrating inputs from multiple actors, and unified web & mobile clients to ensure consistent, maintainable functionality.

## Kaffy
Flower Selling Platform
*   Built a full-stack mobile & web marketplace for flower delivery with multi-role support (customers, delivery, admin), emphasizing rapid deployment and high quality.
*   Developed dynamic storefronts, product catalog, order management, and real-time order tracking, integrating Stripe payments and secure authentication.
*   Implemented role-based dashboards for admin and delivery personnel, connecting frontend and backend with real-time APIs to ensure seamless order updates and notifications, delivering tangible impact.

## TrainityHub
AI-Powered Fitness Growth Platform | Work-in-Progress
*   Designed and developed TrainityHub, a modular SaaS platform for fitness, featuring multi-role support and subscription tiers.
*   Engineered complex, responsive front-end UI and dashboards with Next.js and React, optimized for performance and user experience.
*   Architected the system with a focus on scalability and future AI integration, including planned features for AI-driven body form correction and personalized growth recommendations, aligning with modern learning and development paradigms.

# EDUCATION
## Bachelor of Engineering in Software Engineering
National University of Sciences and Technology - Islamabad
## Intermediate in Computer Science
Government College University - Lahore

# CERTIFICATES
*   Career Essentials in Software Development (Microsoft)
*   Getting Started as a Full-Stack Web Developer (LinkedIn)

# VOLUNTEERING EXPERIENCE
## TEDxNUST, ON‚ÄôNUST, NIMUN
Director Web and IT
*   Led technical direction and web interface across three major university events (TEDxNUST, Orientation NUST, NIMUN), managing development, deployment, and live systems for registration and engagement of the platforms."
